name: team-feedback
description: A simple web app to be used as a playground for studying Grafana and its related tools.

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND-API,WEB-APP" -c "bgGreen.bold,bgBlue.bold" "cd packages/backend-api && npm run dev" "cd packages/web-app && npm run dev"

author: Alcides Queiroz <hello@alcidesqueiroz.com>
